programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: The life and career of the English actor and film-maker, who starred in Brighton Rock, 10 Rillington Place, The Great Escape and Jurassic Park and won an Oscar for directing Gandhi

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Three aristocratic ladies are reunited by the death of a woman who once served their families. They invite the deceaseds niece to lunch, but she proves a surprising guest

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A doctor is distraught when his wife disappears, but he finds life has its own surprises. With John Duttine, Susan Penhaligon and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A book publisher visits two elderly sisters at their Louisiana mansion and one of them has written a murder mystery that may contain more fact than fiction

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A mystery writers imagination gets her in trouble when she turns her overstimulated mind to her new next-door neighbours

programme.title: Andre Rieu in Dublin
programme.desc: A concert in the Irish capital by the violinist and his Johann Strauss Orchestra, featuring romantic melodies, popular classics, party tunes and beloved waltzes

programme.title: Jamie Cullum Live at Blenheim Palace
programme.desc: A 2004 concert at the Oxfordshire stately home by the jazz musician and his band, featuring songs by Cole Porter, Jimi Hendrix, Alan Jay Lerner, Radiohead and N.E.R.D

programme.title: Ella Fitzgerald: Live at Montreux
programme.desc: The jazz singers debut appearance at the festival in 1969, a stage she would go on to grace many more times in her career. Backed by the Tommy Flanagan Trio, she performs songs including Sunshine of Your Love, Hey Jude, I Wont Dance and That Old Black Magic

programme.title: Cleo Laine: The Unseen Home Movies
programme.desc: An interview with the award-winning jazz, pop and classical singer Cleo Laine, combining stories of her past with previously unseen footage from her personal archives

programme.title: The Art of Australia
programme.desc: Edmund Capon investigates how Australian identity evolved in the first half of the 20th century against the backdrop of the First and Second World Wars. He reveals how artists explored the possibilities and exposed the problems of the new nation, revolutionising the countrys creativity and seeing their work become recognised on a global stage

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard, the owners of Carlton Towers near Selby in North Yorkshire, prepare to host a fitness boot camp weekend at their property - while also welcoming an array of guests to celebrate their sons birthday. Meanwhile, Sir Benjamin Slade hopes a murder mystery weekend at Maunsel House in Somerset will help pay off a sizeable electricity bill

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Everyday life at Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, where the members of staff try to tactfully deal with the whims of their employer, baronet Humphry Wakefield, as the estate prepares to welcome a band of ghost-hunting tourists. Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard try to impress American guests at Carlton Towers with a programme of traditional activities, including skinning rabbits and taking high tea. Meanwhile, Sir Humphry Wakefield entertains tourists on a wine-tasting weekend at Chillingham Castle

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Tywin readies his son Jaime for battle as House Lannister prepares for conflict, and Ned confronts Cersei about what he has learnt while investigating Jon Arryns death. Meanwhile, at the Wall, Jon Snow waits to make his vows to the Nights Watch, and across the sea, Khal Drogo vows revenge on the Seven Kingdoms in response to the attempted assassination of Daenerys. Starring Charles Dance and Sean Bean

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Battle commences as the Lannisters launch their bid to seize the throne. Robb rounds up his allies as he prepares to confront Tywins troops, while Tyrion forms an unlikely alliance with a savage tribe. At Kings Landing, Arya and Syrio are forced to fight for their lives, and a sinister new enemy emerges at Castle Black. Meanwhile, Daenerys tries to reconcile her lust for power with the shocking brutality of war

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned struggles to endure his imprisonment at the hands of the Lannisters, and faces a fateful decision to save Sansas life - while Catelyn negotiates a deal with an unreliable ally. Tyrions father forces him to take to the battlefield, Robb seeks to prove his mettle in combat, and Daenerys power comes under threat as Drogos condition worsens. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robbs bannermen make a declaration that threatens to throw Westeros into disarray. Catelyn confronts Jaime Lannister about Brans near-fatal fall, Arya tries to flee the capital, and Tywin sends Tyrion on a surprising assignment. Jon Snow struggles to decide where his loyalties lie, and Daenerys tries to rebuild her life after a tragic event. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden and Michelle Fairley

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The seven kingdoms of Westeros prepare for all-out war as newly crowned King in the North Robb Stark marches south to avenge his father. Tyrion Lannister arrives in Kings Landing to curb the excesses of teenage tyrant Joffrey, and Stannis Baratheon, brother of the late King Robert, sets his sights on the Iron Throne. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Stephen Dillane, Richard Madden, Peter Dinklage and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion turns his anger on Cersei for alienating Joffreys subjects in the wake of the capitals bloody purge, and Theon returns to the Iron Islands for first time in nine years, where he discovers his father Balon is planning to rebel against the crown once again. Arya shares a secret with her new friend Gendry while travelling north to the Wall, and Davos Seaworth recruits an ally who may prove useful in Stannis Baratheons naval invasion of Kings Landing

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion strengthens his position as Hand of the King with a risky gambit devised to identify the member of the small council in league with his sister Cersei, while at Winterfell, Maester Luwin tries to help Bran make sense of his dreams. Catelyn travels to the Stormlands to foster an alliance with the Baratheons, but King Renly, his new wife Margaery Tyrell and her brother Ser Loras have other plans. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb Starks chain of victories against the Lannisters enrages Joffrey, who punishes Sansa for her brothers successes. Tyrion struggles to find a way to curb his nephews cruel excesses and enlists Cerseis lover Lancel as an informant. Catelyn urges the Baratheon brothers to forgo their ambitions and unite against a common enemy, while across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys and her exhausted retinue arrive at the walled city of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Catelyn is forced to flee when the Baratheon brothers rivalry comes to a bloody end, and Lord Baelish spots an opportunity to further his own ambitions. Tyrion discovers Joffrey is planning to use a secret weapon to defend his seat of power, and Theon sails for the Stony Shore to prove his worth as a Greyjoy. Arya receives a favour from the man she freed from Harrenhal, and the Nights Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men to stem the advance of the wildling army

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Old Gods and the New
programme.desc: King Joffreys tyrannical rule prompts the people of Kings Landing to riot, with near devastating consequences for Sansa. Meanwhile, beyond the Wall, Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself. and across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys resolve strengthens as she vows to reclaim what she believes is rightfully hers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theons determination to prove his Ironborn status prompts him to embark on a hunt. Daenerys receives an invitation that could prove useful to her cause, and Jaime Lannisters fortunes appear to change after a meeting with a relative among Robb Starks captives. Fantasy drama, starring Alfie Allen, Emilia Clarke and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: As Detective Alcaras investigates Milos disappearance, Marissa and Jenny work to raise awareness and a press conference turns ugly. Mystery thriller starring Sarah Snook

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: While Hank leads the search for Clark, Prior asks Danvers about the murder-suicide case that drove a wedge between her and Navarro. After sifting through the contents of Clarks trailer, Navarro and Danvers seek out a local hairdresser for insight on Annie, which leads to a tip about another former Tsalal worker. Later, tensions grow between Danvers and her stepdaughter Leah

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Bunk and Freamon try to interview the crew of the Atlantic Light, but fail to find anyone who admits to speaking English. Frank Sobotka tries to court political favour to fulfil his hopes for the regeneration of the docks, while his nephew Nick and son Ziggy conspire to steal a shipment of digital cameras. Omar signs up some new partners in crime and Avon deals with an abusive prison officer

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul visits his lawyer after being served with a lawsuit by the father of a former patient - but when he arrives at the office, he is surprised to find he will be represented by Mia, a woman he treated 20 years previously. However, as they discuss the case, the psychoanalyst senses something untoward about the situation. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne and Hope Davis

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: As the Waystar team discusses a pivotal recommendation to the board, Roman, Kendall and Shiv navigate a misstep with Matsson. Jeremy Strong, Sarah Snook and Kieran Culkin star

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.sub-title: The Great Swirling Apparatus of Our Planets Function
programme.desc: After their efforts are rejected by Chief Bowers, the kids must deal with their disappointment and a series of increasingly terrifying experiences. As General Shaw escalates his efforts to find answers, Charlotte tries to advocate for a reluctant Hank, who worries his secret will get out. Urged on by the Patty Cakes, Marge pulls a mean-spirited prank on Lilly

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: Even God Doesnt Know What to Make of You
programme.desc: Hood reflects on his friendship with Job and ponders his future, while Carrie and Gordon deal with their shattered relationship, and Stowe and Leo get wrapped up in a big job.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Artie reaches crisis point as his business starts to go under in the face of fierce competition from a new restaurant. Meanwhile, Christopher and Little Carmine head west to pursue their new idea for a film, but become obsessed with stealing celebrity goodie bags, and Tony decides to take a break from the hunt for Vito. Guest starring Ben Kingsley and Lauren Bacall

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham residents raise money for a statue to commemorate fishermen lost at sea, but Pat Seddons plan to support the cause by participating in a fundraising skydive worries her friends and relatives. Jan Hart goes trawling for scallops, and shares some ancient superstitions

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Madeline gets under Renatas skin in retaliation for snubbing Ziggy, while Celeste and Perry see a counsellor, and Jane opens up about her past

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Nathan invites Madeline to a dinner to discuss Abigail, and Celeste angers Perry by lending her legal skills to get the play back on track

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The pilot episode of the US drama series finds New Jersey mobster Tony Soprano suffering a midlife crisis and seeking help from psychiatrist Dr Jennifer Melfi. Tonys troubles are numerous - his marriage to Carmela is under strain, daughter Meadow is causing friction and son Anthony Jr remains unaware of his fathers dubious profession. James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco star

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony begins to think that no one can do without him, with requests coming from all quarters. Elderly mum Livia claims she needs help around the house, while Anthony Jr needs someone to find his science teachers stolen car. Offbeat gangster drama, starring James Gandolfini and Lorraine Bracco

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion is sent out to welcome a royal party from Dorne outside the walls of Kings Landing, and Jon Snow finds himself on trial at Castle Black over his time with the wildlings and the death of Qhorin Halfhand. Daenerys heads toward the slave city of Meereen, and Arya runs into a familiar face. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, the day of King Joffreys wedding to Margaery Tyrell arrives, and while the sadistic monarch delights in tormenting his uncle Tyrion, the capitals various factions plot further alliances. However, all attention is drawn back to Joffrey following the arrival of a pie filled with live birds. Meanwhile, Melisandre oversees a sacrifice to the Lord of Light at Dragonstone as three traitors are burned at the stake, and the future continues to look grim for Theon as Ramsay Snow finds a use for him. North of the Wall, Bran sees clearly where he and his friends must go after experiencing a series of visions

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Tensions rise at the school when signs of bullying continue, and Madelines relationship with the play director is put under the spotlight

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Jane confronts Renata when she learns a petition has been raised to exclude Ziggy, and the truth behind Abigails secret project comes out

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A riot is sparked when a bus strikes a black female pedestrian. The white driver is killed in the uproar and, some distance away, another body is found

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A body which has been buried for up to 20 years is uncovered at a construction site. Munch and Lewis start the process of solving this crime _ but the time that has passed makes it difficult

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ser Dontos spirits Sansa out of Kings Landing and rows her out to a waiting ship, and Pod gives Tyrion news of his forthcoming trial. Tywin counsels Tommen on what makes a good king and also has an offer for Oberyn Martell. Sam decides Castle Black is not a safe places for Gilly, while Jon proposes a bold plan after the wildlings send a chilling message. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys picks a champion to take on the best that Meereen has to offer and Davos has an idea about raising funds for Stanniss cause

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Jaime finally visits Tyrion in jail after some persuasion from Bronn, and he also has a mission for Brienne. Daenerys tries to balance justice and mercy in Meereen. At Castle Black, Jon asks for volunteers when Ser Alliser decides to let him go to Crasters Keep to deal with the mutineers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Kit Harrington

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.sub-title: The Great Swirling Apparatus of Our Planets Function
programme.desc: After their efforts are rejected by Chief Bowers, the kids must deal with their disappointment and a series of increasingly terrifying experiences. As General Shaw escalates his efforts to find answers, Charlotte tries to advocate for a reluctant Hank, who worries his secret will get out. Urged on by the Patty Cakes, Marge pulls a mean-spirited prank on Lilly

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Holly gains valuable insight when she investigates an eerily similar case. Meanwhile, Jacks behaviour grows even more erratic, and Glory faces increased scrutiny

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: AJ causes problems for his family as he tries to better his life, and a visit to see Junior at the mental institute lands him in trouble with the police. Vito gains an admirer while hiding out in New Hampshire, and Tony is presented with a tempting real-estate offer

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Proctor, Rebecca, and Burton join forces to take down the Black Beards in a bloody showdown in Philadelphia. Drama, starring Antony Starr

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul holds his first session with April, an architecture student - and becomes concerned when the young woman seems reluctant to reveal why she is seeking therapy. With Gabriel Byrne and Alison Pill

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Pat Seddon considers selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks makes an appearance at Brixhams Crab Festival

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: A professional hitman lets his emotional detachment slip when his mentor is murdered, and puts his deadly skills to the task of getting revenge. The solitary assassin finds an ally in his teachers son, who also yearns for vengeance and persuades the killer to teach him the tricks of the trade. Action thriller remake, starring Jason Statham, Ben Foster and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bays sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: A professional hitman lets his emotional detachment slip when his mentor is murdered, and puts his deadly skills to the task of getting revenge. The solitary assassin finds an ally in his teachers son, who also yearns for vengeance and persuades the killer to teach him the tricks of the trade. Action thriller remake, starring Jason Statham, Ben Foster and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: During the 14th century, William Tell defends his family and his homeland of Switzerland after the Austrian King invades. Historical drama, starring Claes Bang, Connor Swindells, Ben Kingsley and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: A warlord in ancient China sends out messengers throughout his kingdom to declare a reward for whoever can kill three assassins intent on murdering him. In response, a warrior arrives at the rulers palace and claims that he has already defeated the would-be killers, but his story does not quite ring true. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li, Tony Leung Chiu Wai and Maggie Cheung Man-Yuk. In Mandarin

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Youngster Billy Batson is chosen by the ancient wizard Shazam as his new champion, and receives various superpowers. Together with his best friend Freddy Freeman, Billy must come to terms with his new talents in order to stop the evil Dr Thaddeus Sivana. Comedy adventure based on the Captain Marvel and Shazam comics, starring Zachary Levi, Mark Strong and Asher Angel

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the others identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bays action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A pampered pet rodent is flushed down a toilet and ends up in a vast underground rat city in the sewers of London. He is befriended by a quick-witted rat who offers to help him find his way home, but first the hapless pair have to escape the clutches of an evil toad bent on ridding the rodent metropolis of its residents. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Ian McKellen, Shane Richie, Jean Reno and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: A young penguin disappoints his fellow seabirds with his inability to sing - but instead he displays a remarkable talent for tap dancing. However, his elders refuse to accept this outlandish behaviour and send the youngster into exile, marking the start of a wonderful journey. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A free-spirited horse refuses to bend to the will of humans, no matter how badly he is treated by a harsh soldier, whose cruelty only succeeds in driving the stallion to make a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, James Cromwell, Charles Napier, Daniel Studi and Richard McGonagle

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: Lex Luthor poses a threat to Teen Titans and DC Super Hero Girls, who reunite to combat Supermans arch enemy. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kimberly Brooks, Greg Cipes and Will Friedle

programme.title: Pils Adventures
programme.desc: Pil, a young orphan living on the streets of Roc-en-Brume with her three tame weasels, disguises herself and embarks on a quest to save the heir to the throne and victim of an enchantment. Animated adventure, with the voice of Eleanor Noble

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: A young penguin disappoints his fellow seabirds with his inability to sing - but instead he displays a remarkable talent for tap dancing. However, his elders refuse to accept this outlandish behaviour and send the youngster into exile, marking the start of a wonderful journey. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: A reformed criminal mastermind who has abandoned his wicked ways for a life of fatherhood and jam-making helps a secret agent to bring one of his fellow evil geniuses to justice. The villain in question has stolen a dangerous experimental serum with the power to turn harmless animals into ravening monsters. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase, and for centuries the noblemans ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American father Hiram B Otis moves into the country pile with his family, and daughter Virginia forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to the States. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: A heartless TV executive is cruel to his employees and sees the festive season as nothing more than an opportunity to make money. However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A New York borough is shut down during a blizzard - and a group of cheeky local children steal a snowplough in a desperate attempt to ensure the roads to their school stay closed as long as possible. Meanwhile, parents all over the city struggle to work out what to do with their offspring. Comedy, starring Chris Elliott, Mark Webber, Jean Smart, Chevy Chase, Iggy Pop, Pam Grier and Zena Grey

programme.title: The Cinema List: Elfmas
programme.desc: Learn how to celebrate Christmas the elf way as we unpick Buddys festive routine in the holiday classic, Elf

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude, Wheres My Donkey?!
programme.desc: The pupils of St Bernadettes face a new challenge as Christmas approaches, when their new teacher loses his memory, forgetting everything about the festive season and that he is about to get married. It falls to the kids, led by excitable teacher Mr Poppy, to help him remember both in time for the wedding. Comedy sequel, starring Martin Clunes, Catherine Tate, Marc Wootton and Celia Imrie

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: A millionaire feels unfulfilled in spite of his great fortune. He decides a traditional family Christmas is the thing that is missing from his life, so he hires a family to spend the season of goodwill with him. Unfortunately, the plan goes haywire with the arrival of an unexpected guest. Comedy, starring Ben Affleck, James Gandolfini, Christina Applegate and Catherine OHara

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: A retired mechanic who lost his wife a year earlier invites his daughters and sons to his house for a traditional celebration. However, its not long before they start arguing, seemingly scuppering his chances of a happy Christmas. Comedy, starring Danny Glover, Romany Malco and MoNique

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: A woman moves in with her brother and his family after her latest break-up. She begins a relationship with a drug dealer who babysits the couples two-year-old son, while also trying to persuade her sister-in-law that she needs to try and get more out of her life. Comedy drama, starring Anna Kendrick, Melanie Lynskey and Lena Dunham

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A New York borough is shut down during a blizzard - and a group of cheeky local children steal a snowplough in a desperate attempt to ensure the roads to their school stay closed as long as possible. Meanwhile, parents all over the city struggle to work out what to do with their offspring. Comedy, starring Chris Elliott, Mark Webber, Jean Smart, Chevy Chase, Iggy Pop, Pam Grier and Zena Grey

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngsters assailants using his martial arts skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagis is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemys own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A drilling operation unleashes a subterranean creature which feeds on oil. The monster bonds with a monster truck which a local teenager is building from spare parts, and the youngster befriends the beast and helps it to return to its underground home. Fantasy adventure, starring Lucas Till and Jane Levy

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagis is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemys own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A drilling operation unleashes a subterranean creature which feeds on oil. The monster bonds with a monster truck which a local teenager is building from spare parts, and the youngster befriends the beast and helps it to return to its underground home. Fantasy adventure, starring Lucas Till and Jane Levy

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: The teenage martial arts expert becomes obsessed with defending his championship title, but wise mentor Mr Miyagi is not prepared to help him fight for such a shallow goal. Seeking someone else to help guide his career, he falls under the influence of a crooked trainer - who is secretly plotting his downfall with the help of an old adversary. Adventure sequel, starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: British wizard Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York City with a bagful of magical creatures as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but gets caught up in a conflict when some of the creatures in his care are accidentally released after an inadvertent switching of suitcases with a baker. With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes discover their arch enemy Shredder has returned from another dimension, and made a deal with an alien warlord. Assisted by two mutant henchman, Shredder goes in search of a lost device that will allow his new ally to mount an invasion of Earth. Action adventure sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Stephen Amell

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era conman meets a canny nine-year-old orphan, whom he realises could be his daughter, and agrees to take her to her aunt. Along the way, he discovers the little girl is just as cunning as he is, and they form a successful criminal partnership. Drama, starring Ryan ONeal alongside real-life daughter Tatum. With Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman and Randy Quaid

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Leans Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Wise karate mentor Mr Miyagi meets the orphaned teenage grand-daughter of a soldier who once saved his life. As well as guiding her through the trials of high school and her first romance, he takes her to a Zen monastery to hone her martial arts skills. Adventure sequel, starring Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside and Constance Towers

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: A young womans father forbids her to marry until her older sister is wed first - a tall order given the elder siblings fiery temper and sharp tongue. When a fortune-hunting rogue arrives in town, three men keen to marry the younger sister persuade him to woo the older. Franco Zeffirellis adaptation of William Shakespeares comedy, starring Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capotes novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam

programme.title: Boyz N the Hood
programme.desc: A bright but underachieving teenager with a domineering single father strikes up a friendship with two brothers, and over time, the three young men each follow their own path - but a tragedy eventually leaves them facing a dangerous choice. Drama, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Laurence Fishburne, Morris Chestnut and Ice Cube

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each others lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: A 15th-century Transylvanian knight becomes a vampire after the death of his beloved wife. Centuries later, he learns she has been reincarnated, and travels to Victorian London with the intent of seducing her into joining him in living death. Francis Ford Coppolas Gothic horror based on the novel, starring Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins and Keanu Reeves

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: American football player Joe gets snatched away to the afterlife following his death, but the angel responsible realises too late he was supposed to survive. Joe is offered the chance to return to the land of the living by taking over the body of a murdered millionaire - to the shock of the dead mans killers. Fantasy drama, starring Warren Beatty, Julie Christie and James Mason

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Racial tensions erupt in a Brooklyn neighbourhood on the hottest day of the summer. The simmering conflicts centre on the Italian-owned local pizza parlour, as a minor dispute gradually escalates into full-blown violence. Drama, directed by and starring Spike Lee, with Danny Aiello, John Turturro, Ossie Davis, Rosie Perez and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. But bit by bit, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each others lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowes romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Nov 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Christmas on Duty
programme.desc: Former army rivals Blair and Josh must work Christmas duty together. When a snowstorm threatens holiday deliveries to the base, theyre forced to cooperate to save Christmas, despite their past conflicts. Romantic drama, starring Janel Parrish and Parker Young

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: A 19th-century widow must make an unimaginable choice when, during a cruel winter, a foreign ship sinks off the coast of her fishing village. Horror mystery, starring Odessa Young, Joe Cole, Siobhan Finneran and Rory McCann

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sisters death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of their small New England town. Part one of a two-part Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After African American photographer Chris and his white girlfriend Rose visit her wealthy parents, he suspects theres more to the locals than meets the eye. Oscar-winning psychological thriller written and directed by Jordan Peele (Us), starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: A streetwise punk takes a job repossessing vehicles. While a veteran repo man shows him the tricks of the trade, he encounters a UFO conspiracy theorist and gets involved with the hunt for a car with something sinister lurking in the boot. Sci-fi comedy, starring Emilio Estevez, Harry Dean Stanton, Tracey Walter, Fox Harris and Vonetta McGee

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A sleazy TV producer investigates a violent pirate broadcast that may be a real snuff movie. In the process, he uncovers a sinister plot to turn the public into brainless drones through their televisions. David Cronenbergs surreal horror, starring James Woods, Sonja Smits, Deborah Harry and Peter Dvorsky

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sisters death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman
